>
[Waverider Barding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1327)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=29" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 55</row>

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn barding

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [light barding](/Rules.aspx?ID=255) is covered in wavelike patterns. The barding adjusts to fit your animal companion regardless of its shape.
